author: coffeebank
install_msg:
Thanks for installing :)

First, load the cog using `[p]load spotifyembed`

Then, enable auto-Spotify-embed-ing links using `[p]setspotifyembed enable`

To make links manually, use `[p]spotifyembed SPOTIFYLINKHERE`

See documentation at https://coffeebank.github.io/coffee-cogs/spotifyembed/
name: spotifyembed
short: Automatically send replies to Spotify links with the embed preview, for mobile users
description: Automatically send a reply to Spotify links with a link to the embed preview. Convenient for mobile users who can finally listen to music samples from Discord, without needing an account.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
